com.telekom.m2m.cot.restsdk

Class CloudOfThingsPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telekom.m2m.cot.restsdk.CloudOfThingsPlatform

  • public class CloudOfThingsPlatform
extends Object
    The CloudOfThingsPlatform is the starting point to access the Cloud of Things.

    Created by Patrick Steinert on 30.01.16.

    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CloudOfThingsPlatform(String host, CotCredentials cotCredentials)
      Get a platform object to register new devices.
      CloudOfThingsPlatform(String host, CotCredentials cotCredentials, String proxyHost, int proxyPort)
      Get a platform object to register new devices.
      CloudOfThingsPlatform(String host, String username, String password)
      Creates a CloudOfThingsPlatform object, the start point to interfere with the CoT.
      CloudOfThingsPlatform(String host, String username, String password, String proxyHost, int proxyPort)
      Creates a CloudOfThingsPlatform object, the start point to interfere with the CoT over HTTP proxy server.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CloudOfThingsPlatform

        public CloudOfThingsPlatform(String host,
                             CotCredentials cotCredentials)
        Get a platform object to register new devices. This should be used for retrieving the credentials.
        Parameters:
        host - URL to the host to connect to
        cotCredentials - a credentials object with the credentials.

      • CloudOfThingsPlatform

        public CloudOfThingsPlatform(String host,
                             String username,
                             String password)
        Creates a CloudOfThingsPlatform object, the start point to interfere with the CoT.
        Parameters:
        host - URL to the host to connect to.
        username - the username of the platform user.
        password - the username of the platform user.

      • CloudOfThingsPlatform

        public CloudOfThingsPlatform(String host,
                             CotCredentials cotCredentials,
                             String proxyHost,
                             int proxyPort)
        Get a platform object to register new devices. This should be used for retrieving the credentials.
        Parameters:
        host - URL to the host to connect to
        cotCredentials - a credentials object with the credentials.
        proxyHost - hostname of the HTTP proxy server
        proxyPort - port of the HTTP proxy server.

      • CloudOfThingsPlatform

        public CloudOfThingsPlatform(String host,
                             String username,
                             String password,
                             String proxyHost,
                             int proxyPort)
        Creates a CloudOfThingsPlatform object, the start point to interfere with the CoT over HTTP proxy server.
        Parameters:
        host - URL to connect to. Must contain scheme and host, e.g. https://username.int2-ram.m2m.telekom.com
        username - the username of the platform user.
        password - the username of the platform user.
        proxyHost - hostname of the HTTP proxy server
        proxyPort - port of the HTTP proxy server.

    • Method Detail

      • getPlatformToRegisterDevice

        public static CloudOfThingsPlatform getPlatformToRegisterDevice(String host)
        Get a platform object to register new devices. This should be used for retrieving the credentials.
        Parameters:
        host - URL to the host to connect to.
        Returns:
        a CloudOfThingsPlatform object with special connection properties.

      • getPlatformToRegisterDevice

        public static CloudOfThingsPlatform getPlatformToRegisterDevice(String host,
                                                                String proxyHost,
                                                                int proxyPort)
        Get a platform object to register new devices through a proxy server. This should be used for retrieving the credentials.
        Parameters:
        host - URL to the host to connect to.
        proxyHost - hostname of the HTTP proxy server
        proxyPort - port of the HTTP proxy server.
        Returns:
        a CloudOfThingsPlatform object with special connection properties.
